original_food_id.description: The food ID as it was found in the original Food Composition Table. Kept for informational purposes only

original_food_name.description: The food name as it was found in the original Food Composition Table. Kept for informational purposes only

food_genus_id.description: The food genus of this food. Will be used for matching, and, in the future, will come from a curated list.

food_group.description: The food group for this food_genus.

food_subgroup.description: The food subgroup for this food genus.

food_genus_confidence.description: How confident we are in the matching. Mediums will show a warning to the user, low confidence fooditems won't be used in any calculations at all. Possible values: ['High', 'Medium', 'Low']

fct_name.description: The name (citation text?) for the food composition table from which this fooditem came. For example, 'Gambia Prynand Paul'.

citation_original_id.description: The original id of this citation

citation_author.description: The author of the publication from where the nutrient values were derived

citation_publication.description: The publication in which the micronutrient contents of this food were found.

citation_isbn.description: The ISBN for the document where the data were found, if applicable

citation_notes.description: Additonal notes about the source/publication of the data

moisture_in_g.description: The moisture content of this food item, in grams per 100g

nitrogen_in_g.description: Nitrogen content of this fooditem, in grams per 100g

totalprotein_in_g.description: Total Protein Content, in grams per 100g

saturatedfa_in_g.description: Saturated Fatty Acids, in grams per 100g

monounsaturatedfa_in_g.description: Monounsaturated Fatty Acids, in grams per 100g

polyunsaturatedfa_in_g.description: Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids, in grams per 100g

cholesterol_in_mg.description: The Cholesterol content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

fibre_in_g.description: The total dietary fibre content of this food item (determined by multiple methods), in grams per 100g

ash_in_g.description: (I don't think we really need the ash content of the food? candidate for deletion from the system)

ca_in_mg.description: The Calcium content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

fe_in_mg.description: The Iron content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

mg_in_mg.description: The Magnesium content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

p_in_mg.description: The Phosporous content of the food item, in milligrams per 100g

k_in_mg.description: The Potassium content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

na_in_mg.description: The Sodium content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

zn_in_mg.description: The Zinc content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

cu_in_mg.description: The Copper content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

mn_in_mcg.description: The Manganese content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

i_in_mcg.description: the Iodine content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

se_in_mcg.description: The Selenium content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

vitamina_in_rae_in_mcg.description: The Vitamin A content of the food, in Retinol Activity Equivalent (RAE), and in micrograms per 100g

thiamin_in_mg.description: The Thiamin content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

riboflavin_in_mg.description: The Riboflavin content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

niacin_in_mg.description: The Niacin content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

vitaminb6_in_mg.description: The Vitamin B6 content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

folicacid_in_mcg.description: The Folic Acid content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

folate_in_mcg.description: The total folate content of this food item, including food folate and synthetic folate, in micrograms per 100g

vitaminb12_in_mcg.description: The Vitamin B12 content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

pantothenate_in_mg.description: The Pantothenate content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

biotin_in_mcg.description: The Biotin content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

vitaminc_in_mg.description: The Vitamin C content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

vitamind_in_mcg.description: The Vitamin D content of this food item, in micrograms per 100g

vitamine_in_mg.description: The Vitamin E content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g

phytate_in_mg.description: The Phytate content of this food item, in milligrams per 100g
